titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ قَالَ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ عَشْرَ مَرَّاتٍ
titles.en: Chapter 42 – The one who says, ‘O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>! O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>!’ - ten times

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ قَالَ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ عَشْرَ مَرَّاتٍ
titles.en: Chapter 42 – The one who says, ‘O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>! O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>!’ - ten times

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ أَيُّوبَ بْنِ الْحُرِّ أَخِي أُدَيْمٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ مَنْ قَالَ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ عَشْرَ مَرَّاتٍ قِيلَ لَهُ لَبَّيْكَ مَا حَاجَتُكَ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from his father, from Ayoub Bin Al Hurr, a brother of Adeym, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The one who says, ‘O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>! O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>!’, ten times, it would be said to him: ‘At your service, what is your need?’.
